dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: ...Slovenian President Natasa Pirc Musar arriving in Kazakhstan, like, for an official visit, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: ...Slovenian President Natasa Pirc Musar arriving in Kazakhstan, like, for an official visit, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A ceremonial welcome was held at the Akorda residence for Slovenian President Natasa Pirc Musar, who arrived in Kazakhstan on an official visit.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! And, uh, Kassym-Jomart Tokayev, the President of Kazakhstan, like, totally welcomed her at Akorda.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! And, uh, Kassym-Jomart Tokayev, the President of Kazakhstan, like, totally welcomed her at Akorda.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The President of Kazakhstan welcomed the President of Slovenia at the Akorda Residence, according to an official statement from the Head of State.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Akorda Residence, yeah! And it was, um, a full ceremonial welcome, too, not just a handshake.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Akorda Residence, yeah! And it was, um, a full ceremonial welcome, too, not just a handshake.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A ceremonial welcome was held at the Akorda residence for Slovenian President Natasa Pirc Musar, who arrived in Kazakhstan on an official visit.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, absolutely! Introductions of their whole delegations, honor guard report, the works!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, absolutely! Introductions of their whole delegations, honor guard report, the works!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The presidents introduced members of their delegations to each other, after which the commander of the honor guard company delivered a welcome report.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Both anthems played, too, which is, like, such a powerful symbol.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Both anthems played, too, which is, like, such a powerful symbol.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The event was accompanied by the national anthems of Kazakhstan and Slovenia,

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Totally! And then straight into the meeting hall, you know, for the actual talks.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally! And then straight into the meeting hall, you know, for the actual talks.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Following the ceremony, the heads of state proceeded to the meeting hall for talks.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Which, like, I saw some footage from the press service, it was really grand.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which, like, I saw some footage from the press service, it was really grand.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The press service of the Head of State released footage from the ceremonial welcome of President Natasa Pirc Musar at Akorda.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, the footage was amazing! And they're discussing, what, like, bilateral cooperation?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, the footage was amazing! And they're discussing, what, like, bilateral cooperation?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier reports stated that during her visit, Natasa Pirc Musar is scheduled to hold negotiations with Kassym-Jomart Tokayev, during which key issues of bilateral cooperation... will be discussed.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! Trade-economic, investment, um, transport, cultural-humanitarian, all of it!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! Trade-economic, investment, um, transport, cultural-humanitarian, all of it!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...key issues of bilateral cooperation in the trade-economic, investment, transport, and cultural-humanitarian spheres will be discussed.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: And business ties, right? Like, specifically calling out business development.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And business ties, right? Like, specifically calling out business development.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Special attention will be given to the development of business ties.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Yes! And there's going to be, uh, a Kazakh-Slovenian business forum, which is huge for both.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes! And there's going to be, uh, a Kazakh-Slovenian business forum, which is huge for both.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As part of the visit, a Kazakh-Slovenian business forum will also take place.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Huge! And Slovenia, they're really big on, like, ecosystem protection and sustainable development, so I wonder if that came up?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Huge! And Slovenia, they're really big on, like, ecosystem protection and sustainable development, so I wonder if that came up?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Slovenia is actively promoting initiatives in ecosystem protection and sustainable development.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, it has to have, right? Given their initiatives, like, it's gotta be on the agenda.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, it has to have, right? Given their initiatives, like, it's gotta be on the agenda.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, exactly! It makes so much sense for them to, um, really push that angle.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, exactly! It makes so much sense for them to, um, really push that angle.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely! So much going on, you know, between those two countries.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely! So much going on, you know, between those two countries.
